p: In Brazil, chikungunya autochthonous cases were confirmed when two CHIKV genotypes were independently identified during 2014 in Oiapoque (Amap√°, AP) and originating from the Caribbean and South America strains, and the ECSA genotype in Feira de Santana (BA), originating from Angola (West Africa) and Asia [ 17]. The virus rapidly spread, causing large epidemics in urban areas [ 20] and co-circulating with the newly introduced Zika virus (ZIKV) and the four endemic dengue virus (DENV) serotypes. In areas where those arboviruses co-circulate, suspected cases may be misdiagnosed.
